entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -34.0°C
Wind: NNW 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
